message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm being generous.  You can choose to accept this or we can keep playing, but remember the money depreciates with each round!
Let's be fair, Alice. I'm proposing a 52.5/47.5 split.  We both lose if we drag this out.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I still think this split is fair.  We both need to be reasonable if we want to get anything out of this!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a slight majority, take it or let's split down the middle next round before we both lose out.
